alert.note: Alert for Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 6:45PM CDT until April 15 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Grant County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 644 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cane Creek, or 8 miles north of Sheridan, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sheridan... England... Wrightsville... Redfield... Keo... Cane Creek... Estes... Meto... Toltec Mounds State Park... East End... Orion... Hensley Island... Scott... Coy... Belfast... Bevis Corner... Wright... Shaw... Lock and Dam 5 Park... Kearney... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock.
